posts.title: The Batch: Covid-19 Infects AI, Learning from Small Data, Generated Music Goes Mainstream, Fighting Pandemic Disinformation
posts.custom_excerpt:
I recently received an email from one of you who lives far from the major AI hubs, saying, “I feel like I’m all alone.”
I want to tell you all: Even if it sometimes feels like you’re facing the challenges of work and life in isolation, you are not alone!
